Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.repositories

Interface BillRecordRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<BillRecordEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>
@Repository public interface BillRecordRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<BillRecordEntity,Integer>
Repository interface for the bill record.

    • findFirstByStartAndEndAndEnabledTrue

      Optional<BillRecordEntity> findFirstByStartAndEndAndEnabledTrue(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Finds the first enabled BillRecordEntity by start and end date.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date,
      end - the end date
      Returns:
      an Optional with the found BillRecordEntity

    • findAnyByStartAndEnd

      @Query("select b from BillRecordEntity b where (b.start between :start and :end or b.end between :start and :end) and b.enabled") List<BillRecordEntity> findAnyByStartAndEnd(@Param("start") LocalDate start, @Param("end") LocalDate end)
      Finds enabled BillRecordEntity where start or end date is between given dates.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date
      end - the end date
      Returns:
      a List containing the found BillRecordEntity

    • findFirstByEnabledTrueOrderByEndDesc

      Optional<BillRecordEntity> findFirstByEnabledTrueOrderByEndDesc()
      Finds the first enabled BillRecordEntity ordered by end date in descending order.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the found BillRecordEntity, or empty if not found

    • findAmountFindByBillRecordId

      @Query(value="select sum(amount) from bills_expense_fines inner join bills_expense_owners on bills_expense_fines.bill_expense_owner_id = bills_expense_owners.id where bills_expense_owners.bill_record_id = :billRecordId", nativeQuery=true) Object[] findAmountFindByBillRecordId(@Param("billRecordId") Integer billRecordId)
      Finds the total amount of fines for a given bill record ID.
      Parameters:
      billRecordId - the ID of the bill record
      Returns:
      an array containing the total amount of fines

    • findAmountPendingBill

      @Query(value="select sum(expenses.amount/expenses.installments) as amount from expense_installments inner join expenses on expense_installments.expense_id = expenses.id where expense_installments.id not in (select expense_installment_id from bills_expense_installments)", nativeQuery=true) Object[] findAmountPendingBill()
      Finds the total amount of pending bills.
      Returns:
      an array containing the total amount of pending bills
